- Direct backend testing during development
- Running tests with multiple backend sessions

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix HEAD method support for /head-test and /status endpoints

Added HEAD method support to ensure proper HTTP semantics:

1. /head-test endpoint:
   - Changed from separate MapHead + MapGet to unified MapMethods
   - Both HEAD and GET return same headers
   - HEAD returns empty body, GET returns JSON body
   - Fixes 3 failing tests in HttpMethodsTests

2. /status/{code} endpoint:
   - Added HEAD support alongside existing GET
   - Allows HEAD requests to check status codes without body
   - Fixes Head_on_missing_resource_should_return_404 test

All 4 HEAD tests now pass (previously 3 failed).
Part of Priority 1 test coverage roadmap.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
